node.title: Accessing the system
node.description: Testing

node.action: Navigate to https://teodor.bg/
node.expected_result: Home page is loaded and looks like attached picture

node.title: 01. Main Pages
node.description: We are testing the main pages on teodor.bg
node.preconditions: Access the system with non-registered user Page width is set to 1080px

node.title: Open Our shops
node.description: We can open "Our shops" page.

node.action: Find a navigator
Click on "Магазини"
Verify that page title to be "Магазини за мъжка мода в цялата страна — TEODOR"
Assert that page looks like in the picture

node.title: Links by city
node.description: Test link for shops in "Стара Загора"

node.action: Locate Store Listed paragraph
Click on "Стара Загора"
Verify Title
node.expected_result: Title = "Стара Загора • Магазини за мъжки дрехи — TEODOR"

node.action: Assert that page looks like attached picture
Locate Drop down filter radio button
Click on It
Click on "Плевен" option
Verify that Map is changed
Assert that page looks like attached image

node.action: Assert that page looks like attached image

node.action: Assert that page looks like attached image

node.title: 02. Registration
node.description: These tests purpose is to assert registration form.
node.preconditions: Access the system with non-registered user Page width is set to 1080px Navigate to https://teodor.bg/customer/account/create/

node.title: Validation only letters characters
node.description: Test that error message will appear when we submit a form with names from numbers and special symbols.

node.action: Fill field "Име"
Fill field "Фамилия"
Press "Регистрация" button
Assert that form is not submitted
Assert that error messages are "Полетата за имена трябва да съдържат само букви"

node.title: Check name fileds max length
node.description: We are trying to write a name with more that 30 symbols

node.action: Fill field "Име"
Fill field "Фамилия"
Press "РЕГИСТРАЦИЯ"
Assert that form is not submitted
Assert that error message is "Полето Име не може да съдържа повече от 30 символа"
Fill every field with valid data
Fill Email field
Check every required checkboxes
Press "РЕГИСТРАЦИЯ" button
Assert that error message looks like attached image

node.title: Email validat
node.description: Testing email validation

node.action: Fill every field with valid data
Check every required checkboxes
Fill "Email" field
Press "РЕГИСТРАЦИЯ"
Assert that error massage is displayed with recommended steps

node.expected_result: User is redirected to the respective Google page

Fill in field "Фамилия"

Check every required checkbox
Refresh the page

Fill in field "Password"
Click on "Вход" button

Fill in field "Password"
Click on "Вход" button

node.action: Assert that Alert message is like in the picture

Press "Вход" button

node.title: 04. Search

Assert that no results appear

node.title: 07.Cart
node.preconditions: Access the system with non-register user Navigate to https://teodor.bg/product-200147171895-3 Add to cart 1 blue colour, 42 size, 2 brown colour 42,43 size, and 2 beige colour size 44. Click on cart button

node.title: Assert page redirection and view
node.description: Assert that cart view looks like expected

node.action: Assert that page link is "https://teodor.bg/checkout/cart/"
Assert that page looks like attached image
Assert that page title is "Количка — TEODOR"

node.title: Reduce the quantity
node.description: Assure that reducing quantity button works

node.action: Click "-" button to an item in the cart that have quantity - 2
Assert that an item quantity is set to 1
Assert that total price is reduced whit product price

node.title: Reduce the quantity to zero
node.description: Assure that you cant reduce the quantity to zero

node.action: Click "-" button to an item in the cart that have quantity - 1
Assert that an item quantity is set to 1
Assert that total price is the same

node.title: Increase the quantity
node.description: Assure that you can increase the quantity

node.action: Click "+" button to an item in the cart that have quantity - 1
Assert that an item quantity is set to 2
Assert that total price is increased with product price

node.title: Delete an item
node.description: Assert that delete button works as expected

node.action: Click delete button on first item
Assert that an item that you deleted is not in the cart
Assert that price is correct.

node.title: Edit item
node.description: Assure that customer can edit item properties from basket

node.action: Click on pencil button on first item
Change preselected size property
Click on "Актуализирай количката"
Assert that changes are submitted

node.title: Promo code field
node.description: Assert that promo code field will appear

node.action: Click on "Ако имате промо код или код за ваучер, въведето го тук"
Assert that promo code section looks as attached picture
Click on "Ако имате промо код или код за ваучер, въведето го тук"
Click on "Приложи"
Assert that page is not reloaded
Assert that error message is "Това е задължително поле."

node.action: Click on "Към завършване"
Assert that page title is "Поръчай — TEODOR"

node.description: Assure that you can complete your order with empty cart

node.action: Delete every item in cart
